title: Penetration Testing and Vulnerability Analysis
description: Executed a penetration test over a 4-week period, simulating attacks and identifying 5 critical vulnerabilities, gaining root access on a Linux server machine. Pivoted from the compromised server to the client machines in the network, achieving full system compromise in under 2 days.

title: Evasion Attacks
description: Engineered a robust framework generating adversarial samples designed to spoof machine learning models, achieving a misclassification rate of over 85%. Trained the compromised models using adversarial samples, reducing the success rate of evasion attacks by 70%.

title: Hack the Box Challenges
description: Carried out penetration testing and vulnerability assessments through Hack The Box, an online cybersecurity training platform, achieving a 95% success rate in challenge completions.

title: Early-Stage Threat Detection and Remediation System
description: Developed a real-time threat detection system using Honeypots and Splunk, designed for monitoring and alerting on cybersecurity threats.
